head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHT, COHEN, ARLENE.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHT, COHEN, ARLENE.

block.p: LICHT - COHEN - Arlene. The Board of Regents, Administration and staff of Long Island College Hosptial acknowledge with sadness the passing of Arlene LichtCohen, beloved sister of our esteemed friend and highly respected colleague Arnold Licht, MD, Chairman of the Department of Psychiatry. To Dr. Licht, both the Licht and Cohen families, and all of Arlene Licht-Cohen's loved ones, we extend our heartfelt condolences. John D. Wren, Chairman, Board of Regents Allan Gibofsky, MD, JD, President and Chief Executive Officer Edmund Giegerich, MD, Senior Vice President, Medical Affairs

LICHT - COHEN - Arlene. The Board of Regents, Administration and staff of Long Island College Hosptial acknowledge with sadness the passing of Arlene LichtCohen, beloved sister of our esteemed friend and highly respected colleague Arnold Licht, MD, Chairman of the Department of Psychiatry. To Dr. Licht, both the Licht and Cohen families, and all of Arlene Licht-Cohen's loved ones, we extend our heartfelt condolences. John D. Wren, Chairman, Board of Regents Allan Gibofsky, MD, JD, President and Chief Executive Officer Edmund Giegerich, MD, Senior Vice President, Medical Affairs
